shared-stacksize.help: Stack size (bytes) for shared event queue thread

shared-eventsize.help: Event buffer size (bytes) for shared event queue

shared-dispatch-from-application.help: No thread created for shared event queue - application will call dispatch from another thread (eg dispatch_forever at end of main)

shared-highprio-stacksize.help: Stack size (bytes) for shared high-priority event queue thread

shared-highprio-eventsize.help: Event buffer size (bytes) for shared high-priority event queue

use-lowpower-timer-ticker.help: Enable use of low power timer and ticker classes. May reduce the accuracy of the event queue.
